Modifying Dataframes:

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
dogs <- read.csv("dogs.csv")
head(dogs)
summary(dogs)
```

```{r}
dogs <- dogs %>%
  mutate(avg_height = (height_low_inches + height_high_inches)/2)
head(dogs)
```
